attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cap the maximum that lenders add to the bank base rate on mortages to 1%. Set the maximum time for lenders to pass on changes in rates. Lenders are adding between 2 & 3% and are effectively choosing their own interest rate for mortgages. The reductions in base rate are selectively being passed on and there are often long delays before this happens.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
